org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging
Class AeFileLogger

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging.AeInMemoryProcessLogger
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging.AeFileLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeConfigChangeListener, IAeProcessListener, IAeProcessLogger
public class AeFileLogger
extends AeInMemoryProcessLogger

File based logging. Writes the contents of the process log to a file once the process completes.

Field Summary
private static int MAX_LOG_SIZE
          max size of a log permitted to be kept in memory before being written to disk.

Method Detail

deleteLogFiles

protected void deleteLogFiles()
Deletes the existing log files on startup. This is only called during construction of the logger if the "DeleteFilesOnStartup" entry is set to "true" in the config or if not present at all.

getAbbreviatedLog

public java.lang.String getAbbreviatedLog(long aProcessId)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: IAeProcessLogger
Gets an abbreviated form of the log which is suitable for display in the remote debug console or in the admin console. The String returned will contain a configurable amount of the head and tail of the log. The system default is approximately the top 100 lines and the bottom 500 lines, but this will vary with how the logger is implemented.

Specified by:
getAbbreviatedLog in interface IAeProcessLogger
Overrides:
getAbbreviatedLog in class AeInMemoryProcessLogger
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
IAeProcessLogger.getAbbreviatedLog(long)

readAbbreviatedLog

private java.lang.String readAbbreviatedLog(java.io.File aFile)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
Reads the head and tail of the log file. The amount of lines for the head and tail is determined by the engine config.

getFullLog

public java.io.Reader getFullLog(long aProcessId)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: IAeProcessLogger
Returns the entire log as a reader. The size of the log is unknown but it should be assumed that it is not safe to read the entire contents into memory.

Specified by:
getFullLog in interface IAeProcessLogger
Overrides:
getFullLog in class AeInMemoryProcessLogger
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
IAeProcessLogger.getFullLog(long)

writeToFile

protected void writeToFile(long aProcessId)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Writes the contents of the log's memory buffer to disk. This is done when the process closes, buffer gets too big, or if someone is requesting the abbreviated or full log.

Parameters:
aProcessId -
Throws:
java.io.IOException
